token.guia_intro: Learn what tokens are, how to generate them, and their different types.
token.que_es_token_texto: A personal access token (PAT) is a key that allows you to authenticate with the GitHub API without using your password.
token.paso_1: Go to the Token Settings in GitHub.
token.paso_3: Choose the type of token you need.
token.paso_5: Generate and store the token in a safe place.
token.no_compartir: Do not share your token with anyone and keep it safe.
token.tipo_pat_desc: Used to access the GitHub API.
token.tipo_fine_desc: A token with specific permissions and more control.
token.tipo_oauth_desc: Used for authentication in third-party apps.
token.tipo_app_desc: Generated by GitHub Apps for secure authentication.
token.practica_2: Use tokens with the minimum necessary permissions.
token.practica_3: Revoke tokens you no longer use.
token.practica_4: Store tokens in environment variables instead of including them in code.

proyecto_existente: Do you want to upload an existing project from your computer to this repository?

search.empty_field: The search field cannot be empty.
search.error: There was an error with the search. Please try again.

git_organizar_proyectos: Log in with GitHub to start organizing your projects and collaborating with your team.
gestion_repos_tickets: Manage repositories and tickets easily and centrally.
no_tickets_flitros: No tickets match the selected filters.
eliminar_ticket_confirmacion: Are you sure you want to delete this ticket?

carrusel.visualizar_gestionar_repos: View and manage all your GitHub repositories from one place.
carrusel.search_repo_publico: Quickly and easily search any public GitHub repository.
carrusel.stats_detalles_repos: Check full statistics and details of each repository.
carrusel.create_admin_tickets: Easily create and manage tickets linked to your repositories.

not_found.pagina_no_existe: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
